alert.note: Alert for Southeastern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 12 at 5:53PM PDT until March 15 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in California... Russian River near Hopland affecting Southeastern Mendocino Interior zone. For the Russian River...including Hopland...flooding is possible. Additional information is available at weather.gov/eka. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 200 AM PDT. && ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING TO EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Russian River near Hopland. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning to early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Flooding of Highway 175 is expected at the approaches to the Russian River bridge. Expect flooding of cropland on the right bank of river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:45 PM PDT Sunday the stage was 9.9 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached late Tuesday morning and the river is forecast to crest near 15.5 feet Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
